data.client_settings: [BUILD INFO] Release Channel: stable, Build Number: 25070
data.actual_result: User_1 cheats! Try it yourself (mb with a dev-friend or a BOT) - it'll be more clear. Just follow the steps in [2].
data.expected_result: -1) ...; -2) User_1 attempts to join it, but gets just thrown to oblivion (default)
data.short_description: Discord makes you think you joined `voice_chan_2` while in reality you are still in `voice_chan_1`! And it's also spooky
data.steps_to_repro: - Channel permissions: - 1st channel: View-off and Connect-on - 2nd channel: optional(View-on) and Connect-off - 1) User_1 ANYHOW joins the 1st channel (gets dragged into / uses invite-link); - 2) User_1 uses the 2nd channel's invite-link; - = Now User_1 thinks&sees he's in the 2nd channel, while, in fact, he's still in the 1st channel. - = Everyone (but User_1) can observe that User_1 is still in the 1st channel. - 3) User_2 joins the 1st channel; - 4) ??? - 5) SPOOKY VOICES!!! Try it out with your friends and family!
